API Docs for Sandy 3D Engine haXe Port, ver. 3.1.1

sandy.events.Shape3DEvent

type
class
extends
BubbleEvent
version
3.1
This class represents the type of events broadcasted by shapes objects. It gives some useful information about the clicked object such as the polygon clicked, and real 3D position of the point under mouse, the UV coordinate under mouse. It allows some advanced interaction with the object and its texture.

Constructor

new()
parameters
e A name for the event.
p_oShape The Shape3D object reference
p_oPolygon The Polygon object reference
p_oUV The UVCoord object which corresponds to the UVCoord under mouse position
p_oPoint3d The Point3D object which is the real 3D position under the mouse position
p_oEvent The original Flash event instance
see
sandy.core.scenegraph.Scene3D
sandy.core.data.Polygon
sandy.core.data.UVCoord
sandy.core.data.Point3D
Constructs a new Shape3DEvent instance.

Example var e:Shape3DEvent = new Shape3DEvent(MyClass.onSomething, theShapeReference, thePolygonReference, theUVCoord, theReal3DIntersectionPoint);
